title: ❤️ What’s the meaning of life?
text: Well, that's a million-dollar question! That's why it is the first one! We're here, and it's a mystery. Life's meaning is a personal quest. It's about finding your purpose and what brings meaning to your journey.

title: 💰 Should I have children?
text: Well, that's a real big life decision! If you've got faith in the future and believe in the magic of raising little humans, go for it. If not, that's cool too. It's all about what feels right for you.

title: 😫 Can we find happiness in a world filled with suffering?
text: Absolutely, you can find happiness even when the world seems to be on a rollercoaster of madness. It's all about your perspective and how you navigate through life. While you can't control everything happening around you, you can absolutely control how you respond to it.

title: 😊 What is happiness?
text: Happiness isn't just about a smile on your face or a mountain of stuff. It's that warm, fuzzy feeling inside, like you're in sync with the rhythm of the universe. It's not about what you possess; it's about how you feel deep down. It's that sense of contentment, inner serenity, and a bright outlook on life. Think of it as having that Zen master vibe, being cool no matter what's going down in the world.

title: 💪🏻 Is there a higher power?
text: Who knows? It's a personal journey to figure out if there's something bigger out there.

title: 🆓 How can we attain true freedom?
text: True freedom is like knowing yourself inside out. It's not just doing whatever you want, it's understanding why you do what you do. It's the key to being truly free.

title: 😇 What makes you a good person
text: Good people are the ones who spread kindness, help others in need, and make the world a better place through their actions and compassion.
